pages.text: Magic Doors are a staple of wizard culture. Many decorate their houses with them, as they provide just a little bit of extra security against would-be intruders.$(br2)They require a magic word or phrase to be said in order to open them, though many wizards find it humorous to simply make the magic pass phrase "please."
You can change the magic word/pass phrase of Magic Doors you own by Sneak + $(k:key.use) them while holding a named Name Tag.
